faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Image Upscaling

items.title: What types of images can be upscaled?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI supports various formats, including JPG, PNG, and WebP. You can upscale any image to enhance detail and resolution.

items.title: Is there a limit on how many images I can upscale?
items.description: Yes! You can enhance 30 images daily with free credits. Additional credits can be earned through challenges.

items.title: Can I use the upscaled images commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users on paid plans can use upscaled images for commercial purposes. Free-tier users are limited to personal use.

items.title: How secure is the image processing?
items.description: Images are processed locally in your browser, ensuring your data never leaves your device. Your privacy is always protected.
